summary: Project now includes UI changes to add a "Create Mod" section above the main Create Character/Create Story Mode tabs, plus video game advertisement integrations including a required 1-minute ad after creators finish projects.

existing_features.title: Add a prominent “Create Mod” section that appears above the main content (above any existing tab navigation where present) on creator-oriented pages so it is shown above both the Create Character and Create Story Mode experiences, and link the section to the existing Mod Create route (/create).

Integrate 30-second “video game ads” into the website by adding an ad placement component that can display a 30-second ad experience (video player UI with a visible 30-second countdown and clear “Advertisement” labeling) on key pages.

Require creators to watch a 1-minute video game advertisement after successfully finishing/publishing a project by gating completion flows with a mandatory 60-second ad modal that cannot be dismissed until the countdown completes.

Establish and apply a cohesive, modern visual theme for the new “Create Mod” section and ad UI (colors, typography accents, and layout), consistent across all placements, without using a blue/purple primary theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a "Create Mod" section positioned above both the Create Character and Create Story Mode tabs (above entire tab navigation/page content).
Integrate video game advertisements: place 30-second video game ads on the webpage and require creators to watch a 1-minute video game ad after completing their projects.
